messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] the uninformed
messages.msgSnippet: ... That s exactly how I feel toward my mother, Kolleen.  That s why I am raising my children in almost exactly the opposite way she raised me. She made lots
messages.messageBody:
On Tuesday, December 25, 2001, at 03:13 PM, Kolleen wrote:

>> There are windows and
>> if I miss them I have screwed up my child. @@
>>
>> NICKI~
>
>
> I couldn't resist this one Nicki! I have a very sarcastic and sometimes
> devilish toungue and my first thought for you to say back to her was:
> 'like you screwed up yours? *devilish smile*
>
> Okay, I know.. its better to hold your toungue than to start an issue..
> BUT sometimes its irresistable!
>
> good luck!
>
> kolleen
> ++++++++++++++++

That's exactly how I feel toward my mother, Kolleen. That's why I am
raising my children in almost exactly the opposite way she raised me.
She made lots of mistakes, and I'm sure I make some too, but I consider
myself a far superior mother than she is/was.

Mimi

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] the uninformed
messages.msgSnippet: ... I couldn t resist this one Nicki! I have a very sarcastic and sometimes devilish toungue and my first thought for you to say back to her was: like you
messages.messageBody:
> There are windows and
>if I miss them I have screwed up my child. @@
>
> NICKI~


I couldn't resist this one Nicki! I have a very sarcastic and sometimes
devilish toungue and my first thought for you to say back to her was:
'like you screwed up yours? *devilish smile*

Okay, I know.. its better to hold your toungue than to start an issue..
BUT sometimes its irresistable!

good luck!

kolleen
